articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Solar Eclipse: Exactly What You’ll See From The U.K. And 29 European Cities This Thursday - Forbes
articles.description: When is the solar eclipse in London? A European's guide to the partial solar eclipse this week.
articles.content: A seagull is pictured in front of the sun during a partial solar eclipse on March 20, 2015 in ... [+] Tonypandy, Wales, United Kingdom. The solar eclipse, which occurs when the Moon passes between th… [+5676 chars]
